Text: I'd love to have x64 copy! Thanks for the up. Looks like a great image.
Too bad the registry has been tampered with and junk wallpapers, themes, and programs have been included. I'll be passing up this download.

X64 Version is up too.
Uploaded it with an extra .ISO for software install, like Office 2010 and much more.

Enjoy!!

I just found out that this doesn't install as an AIO version.... I forgot to delete the "ei.cfg"file, to make it an AIO version.. Duuuhhh.   

If you want to install another version than Ultimate, unpack the ISO (with alcohol 120% or PowerIso or something similar) 
Delete the "ei.cfg" file, which can be found in the "sources"-folder on the ISO and make it a bootable ISO again...

Sorry 4 the slip-up, shit happens, hope your all satisfied with the torrent anyways!

Grtz, TDM!
